Daughter of Darkness objectives:

Journey to Baldur's Gate. Find a Sharran Lookout. Journey to the House of Grief. Find a way into the Cloister. Confront Viconia.

Once you reach the House of Grief, you will be able to find Shadowheart's friend in the same location even after facing Viconia.

The friend you are looking for is Nocturne. She serves as quartermaster for the Sharran cloister so you can encounter her at the Cloister of Sombre
